question: You work at home and have a problem with a piece of equipment that you use for your job.Write a letter to the shop or company which supplied the equipment.In your letter•	describe the problem with the equipment•	explain how this problem is affecting your work•	say what you want the shop or company to do
text: I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction with the Sony laptop that I purchased from your city centre branch 2 months ago.

As the new financial year started, my company asked us to purchase a new laptop for the working purpose. When visiting your store, I was captivated by the latest Sony computer, so I decided to buy it immediately. However, after 4 days of using this laptop, I realized that I was unable to save various types of documents occasionally such as word and excel.

This issue has affected my work productivity and professional attitudes. For example, I could not find the financial report that I have completed and saved when I was having a meeting with my clients. You can imagine how devasted and embarrassed I was.

Based on the fact, I except my current laptop can be replaced by a new laptop that does not have any system issues at the earliest possible opportunity. In addition, I believe I am entitled to compensation for the inconvenience that this equipment caused.
If you would like to discuss my issue further, please contact me without hesitation. I am looking forward to hearing from you.
